title: [Bug]: gtk 2/3 + gtk 4 causes abort
body:
### Can you reproduce this bug in the website/PWA?

Not applicable

### Describe the bug

"Gtk-ERROR **: 09:26:25.159: GTK 2/3 symbols detected. Using GTK 2/3 and GTK 4 in the same process is not supported." ... SIGTRAP, Trace/breakpoint trap.

### What package are you using?

rpm

### Version

2.0.17

### Reproduction steps

```markdown
Fedora 42.
1. upgrade to TfL 2.0.17
2. run it
3. boom
```

### Expected Behavior

```markdown

```

### Debug

```markdown

```

_No response_
